channel.title: Tools on DIME-SHS
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on DIME-SHS

item.title: ELIPSS mobile app
item.description: The ELIPSS mobile app is a tool that provides the panellists with access the questionnaires and allows the interactive mapping of multimedia content or photographic acquisition.

item.title: Hyphe
item.description: Web crawler and support interface for the creation of web corpora used to map web presence and hypertext links between web entities around a particular subject.

item.title: Hyphe-Browser
item.description: A Web browser connected to Hyphe at all times, allowing to build and explore a web corpus while visualizing the pages of the websites so that the user can curate and categorize them easily.

item.title: Survey management back-office
item.description: A web application for scheduling the distribution of surveys, in preproduction or production, and to track the progress of fieldwork using real-time statistical visualisation.

item.title: Gazouilloire
item.description: Tool for the systematic recovery of data from Twitter’s API (tracking of keywords, URLs, users, co-citation networks, retweets…).

item.title: Panellist management back-office
item.description: Web application providing a one-stop support desk and panellist tracking. In particular, it incorporates response monitoring and multimode reminders (telephone, mobile alerts, emails, text messages, ordinary and recommended letter).

item.title: Catwalk
item.description: Tool for qualitative selection and categorisation of tweets.

item.title: Fleet management back-office
item.description: A web application which provides the support desk with up-to-date information for use in incident handling (tablets and data subscriptions).

item.title: Minet
item.description: Command line tool written in python enabling its users to perform complex webmining tasks with ease.

item.title: Google Bookmarklets
item.description: Controls that can be added to the web browser to recover a list of results and metadata from a Google search in the form of data tables.

item.title: SeeAlsology
item.description: An exploratory tool designed to construct semantic networks from the “See also” links present on many Wikipedia pages.

item.title: Science Scape
item.description: Interface for the exploration, analysis and visualisation of scientometric data exportable from Scopus and Web Of Science.

item.title: Table2Net
item.description: A simple web interface that produces a display of a data table file in the form of a network.

item.title: Graph Recipes
item.description: A web interface that can be used to conduct analyses, calculate metrics and produce visualisations from network data.

item.title: Access rights manager
item.description: A web interface for creating accounts and managing survey access permissions (individually or in batches).

item.title: Anonymised document viewer
item.description: A web interface for viewing interview transcripts (speaking turns, stage comments, silence, etc.) using files previously encoded manually in XML-TEI on EXMARaLDA.

item.title: Bibliography on qualitative HSS surveys
item.description: A Zotero bibliography produced by monitoring the sharing, documentation and reuse of qualitative social science surveys.

item.title: Explorer of survey materials
item.description: A web interface that facilitates the exploration of survey materials through different filters (categories used in the classification scheme, timeline, geographical location of documents).

item.title: Marvin
item.description: Script for checking files generated by document digitisation: it checks the validity and format of the JPEG2000 files requested in the specifications.

item.title: Mets2json
item.description: Script that converts the METS standard to JSON in order to make surveys available on the beQuali website.

item.title: Qualitative survey classification scheme
item.description: Developed from experience acquired in the handling of qualitative surveys, this classification scheme is divided into four levels (sub-group, folder, subfolder, and article).

item.title: Sally
item.description: Script for checking files generated by document digitisation: it checks the validity and format of the PDF/A-1b files requested in the specifications.

item.title: Teaching Resources
item.description: A web interface to search for qualitative surveys materials to illustrate a social sciences methodology course (research methodology and survey filters).
